channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oracle’s monster $25 billion debt financing points to anxieties around AI funding
item.description: Oracle plans to raise up to another $25 billion this year but said the sales would be either equity or equity-linked issuances.

item.title: Super Micro logs record revenue from AI demand, and the stock surges
item.description: Super Micro’s revenue exploded to $12.7 billion as delayed orders finally materialized, but aggressive competition and rising costs pushed gross margi...

item.title: ‘This is our second marriage’: We’re in our 60s. How do we split expenses if we move in together and rent one house?
item.description: “We have been taking turns living in his house and my house.”

item.title: Chase cut my credit-card limit due to lower usage. Will this affect my credit score and lead other banks to do the same?
item.description: “I’m wondering whether this could cause a ripple effect in which other banks might do the same with my lesser-used credit cards.”

item.title: ‘I’m spooked’: Do gold and silver belong in my retirement portfolio after their dramatic fall in value?
item.description: “Before you ask, there is nothing extreme about 5% of my ‘alternative’ assets.”

item.title: This little-known banking stock has upside, Bank of America says — and a nice dividend
item.description: Head over to the Caribbean for an unsung bank stock that offers a combination of upside and income.

item.title: JPMorgan’s favorite stocks for February
item.description: The bank is adding an industrial real estate company and removing some retailers from its monthly list.

item.title: Cisco has finally surpassed its dotcom bubble high. Is the reinvented stock a buy from here?
item.description: Today's Cisco looks little like the hardware-centric growth engine that briefly became the world's most valuable company at the height of the internet...

item.title: The AI trend can give dividend aristocrats a boost, Raymond James says
item.description: After years of underperformance, the tide could be starting to shift for dividend stocks, according to Raymond James.

item.title: This data center power play is about to report earnings, and it has room to run, charts show
item.description: Bloom Energy is slated to report earnings on Thursday. The stock could rise further from here, according to the charts.

item.title: Biotech Stocks Skyrocket on Game-Changing News
item.description: Discover why biotech stocks like CRVS and RAPT are surging today on trial breakthroughs and deals. Learn trading insights and risks in this exciting m...

item.title: SelectQuote Surges 23% on $415M Credit Facility News
item.description: SelectQuote (SLQT) stock jumped 23% on January 12, 2026 after securing a $415M credit facility. Dive into the details, risks, benefits, and how simila...

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...

item.title: FIGR Stock Jumps Big on Blockchain Lending Wave
item.description: Discover why Figure Technology Solutions (FIGR) surged 21.67% today amid blockchain advancements like $YLDS and RWA Consortium. Learn trading lessons,...

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...
